div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1075 Kamenskoe, near Kamenka-Dne- provskaia, Zaporozh'e oblast, Ukraine, 1914 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 21+ AE. Pot hoard Olbia: 19 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 26-29) Panticapaeum: 2 AE (as BMC 23) Disposition: Melitopol' (Regional Mus.) Volchkova, Kratkie Soobshcheniia Institut Arkheo- logii Akademii Nauk Ukrainshol SSR 6 (Kiev, 1956), pp. 55-6
